allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -ano ^| findstr :3000 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do taskkill /F /PID %a")
Bash(schtasks /create /tn "ClawdBot Daily Restart" /tr "taskkill /F /IM node.exe && timeout /t 5 && clawdbot gateway --port 18789" /sc daily /st 05:00 /f)
Bash(schtasks /create /tn "ClawdBot Gateway" /tr "cmd /c clawdbot gateway --port 18789" /sc onlogon /rl highest /f)
Bash(cmd //c "schtasks /create /tn ""ClawdBot Gateway"" /tr ""cmd /c clawdbot gateway --port 18789"" /sc onlogon /rl highest /f")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Command cloudflared -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Source; winget show cloudflare.cloudflared 2>$null | Select-String ''Publisher|Installed''")
Bash(ssh -o ConnectTimeout=15 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 "uname -a && free -h && df -h")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 "docker --version 2>/dev/null && docker compose version 2>/dev/null || echo ''Docker not installed''")

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 "apt-get update && apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg && install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings && curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg && chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg")

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 'echo ""deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu noble stable"" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null && apt-get update && apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin')
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 "docker --version && docker compose version && systemctl status docker --no-pager | head -5")

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 "mkdir -p /opt/postiz && cd /opt/postiz && curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/main/docker-compose.yml -o docker-compose.yml && curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/main/.env.example -o .env")

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 'mkdir -p /opt/postiz && cat > /opt/postiz/docker-compose.yml << ''''EOF''''
services:
  postiz:
    image: ghcr.io/gitroomhq/postiz-app:latest
    container_name: postiz
    restart: always
    environment:
      MAIN_URL: ""http://133.117.72.109:5000""
      FRONTEND_URL: ""http://133.117.72.109:5000""
      NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL: ""http://133.117.72.109:5000/api""
      JWT_SECRET: ""${JWT_SECRET}""
      DATABASE_URL: ""postgresql://postiz:postiz@postgres:5432/postiz""
      REDIS_URL: ""redis://redis:6379""
      BACKEND_INTERNAL_URL: ""http://localhost:3000""
      IS_GENERAL: ""true""
      STORAGE_PROVIDER: ""local""
      UPLOAD_DIRECTORY: ""/uploads""
      NEXT_PUBLIC_UPLOAD_DIRECTORY: ""/uploads""
    volumes:
      - postiz-config:/config
      - postiz-uploads:/uploads
    ports:
      - ""5000:5000""
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - redis
    networks:
      - postiz-network

  postgres:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: postiz-postgres
    restart: always
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: postiz
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postiz
      POSTGRES_DB: postiz
    volumes:
      - postgres-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      - postiz-network

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: postiz-redis
    restart: always
    volumes:
      - redis-data:/data
    networks:
      - postiz-network

volumes:
  postiz-config:
  postiz-uploads:
  postgres-data:
  redis-data:

networks:
  postiz-network:
    driver: bridge
EOF')
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 'cd /opt/postiz && JWT_SECRET=$\(openssl rand -base64 32\) && echo ""JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET"" > .env && cat .env')
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 'cd /opt/postiz && docker compose up -d')

Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 'cd /opt/postiz && docker compose down && cat > docker-compose.yml << ''''EOF''''
services:
  postiz:
    image: ghcr.io/gitroomhq/postiz-app:latest
    container_name: postiz
    restart: always
    environment:
      MAIN_URL: ""http://133.117.72.109:5000""
      FRONTEND_URL: ""http://133.117.72.109:5000""
      NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL: ""http://133.117.72.109:5000/api""
      JWT_SECRET: ""${JWT_SECRET}""
      DATABASE_URL: ""postgresql://postiz:postiz@postgres:5432/postiz""
      REDIS_URL: ""redis://redis:6379""
      BACKEND_INTERNAL_URL: ""http://localhost:3000""
      IS_GENERAL: ""true""
      STORAGE_PROVIDER: ""local""
      UPLOAD_DIRECTORY: ""/uploads""
      NEXT_PUBLIC_UPLOAD_DIRECTORY: ""/uploads""
      DISABLE_TEMPORAL: ""true""
    volumes:
      - postiz-config:/config
      - postiz-uploads:/uploads
    ports:
      - ""5000:5000""
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - redis
    networks:
      - postiz-network

  postgres:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: postiz-postgres
    restart: always
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: postiz
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postiz
      POSTGRES_DB: postiz
    volumes:
      - postgres-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      - postiz-network

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: postiz-redis
    restart: always
    volumes:
      - redis-data:/data
    networks:
      - postiz-network

volumes:
  postiz-config:
  postiz-uploads:
  postgres-data:
  redis-data:

networks:
  postiz-network:
    driver: bridge
EOF')
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@133.117.72.109 'cd /opt/postiz && docker compose up -d && sleep 30 && docker compose logs postiz --tail=30')
